content.raw:
I treid to solve by updating latest gazebo9, but it not working for my ARM environment

```
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 gazebo9 : Depends: gazebo9-common (= 9.8.0-1~bionic) but 9.12.0-1~bionic is to be installed
```

and also another fix \(url: [https://api.ignitionrobotics.org](https://api.ignitionrobotics.org/) \) is not working too.

[https://api.ignitionrobotics.org/fuel/1.0/models](https://api.ignitionrobotics.org/fuel/1.0/models) → 404 not found

any idea?
content.html:
I treid to solve by updating latest gazebo9, but it not working for my ARM environment

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 gazebo9 : Depends: gazebo9-common (= 9.8.0-1~bionic) but 9.12.0-1~bionic is to be installed

and also another fix (url: https://api.ignitionrobotics.org ) is not working too.

https://api.ignitionrobotics.org/fuel/1.0/models → 404 not found

any idea?
